item.title: 丹麦女王玛格丽特今年早些时候宣布退位，令其国家大吃一惊，她的一幅抽象画在哥本哈根拍卖会上以 23,300 美元的价格售出，超过了 11,000-14,550 美元的估价。
item.description:
An abstract painting by Denmark's Queen Margrethe, who surprised her country by abdicating earlier this year, has been sold at a Copenhagen auction at $23,300 — exceeding the estimated price of $11,000-14,550. https://t.co/OI8KBFckJu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 根据新的研究，美国一些沿海城市正在 "消失 "在地面上，这可能会在不久的将来进一步加剧海平面上升的复杂性。
item.description:
Several coastal cities around the United States are "disappearing" into the ground, according to new research — which could further exacerbate complications of sea level rise in the near future. https://t.co/KluKw8Sfz8 pic.twitter.com/Bj5Prfzcfd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 新消息：据警方称，有四人因涉嫌与上周在长岛至少三个地点发现的尸体碎块有关而被捕。
item.description:
NEW: Four people have been arrested in connection with the severed body parts found in at least three locations on Long Island over the last week, according to police. https://t.co/P485iUC9GJ pic.twitter.com/uDpeYmPfDW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 联合国移民机构称，去年全球至少有8565名移民死于陆路和海路，这是该机构十年前开始统计死亡人数以来的最高纪录。
item.description:
At least 8,565 migrants died on land and sea routes worldwide last year, the U.N. migration agency says — a record high since it began tallying deaths a decade ago. https://t.co/78xyOI64Ej

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据周三发表在《自然》杂志上的研究报告称，在乌克兰发现的古代石器可能是欧洲早期人类存在的最古老证据。
item.description:
Ancient stone tools found in Ukraine may be the oldest known evidence of early human presence in Europe, according to research published Wednesday in the journal Nature. https://t.co/gl3FJP1zvl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 警方正在追捕一起仓库盗窃案的嫌疑人，最终他们以夺宝奇兵式的逃跑方式，将车开到了一扇正在关闭的门下。
item.description:
Police are seeking the suspects in a warehouse theft which ended with an Indiana Jones-style getaway, as they drove their car under a closing door. https://t.co/EAhrTWPhaW pic.twitter.com/61zkiDlnkF

item.title: 丹麦女王玛格丽特今年早些时候宣布退位，令她的国家大吃一惊。她的一幅抽象画在哥本哈根拍卖会上以 23,300 美元的价格售出，超过了约 11,000 美元的估价。

item.title: 美国一家法院宣布，美国五家最大的科技公司在一起涉嫌支持刚果民主共和国钴矿开采中使用童工的案件中无罪。
item.description:
A U.S. court has absolved five of America's biggest tech companies in a case over their alleged support of child labor in cobalt mining in the Democratic Republic of Congo. https://t.co/jZ3iwYUEoK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: "公共图书馆是任何良好社会的基础。它就像我们社会的基石，如果这块基石倒了，我们就会崩溃。"前图书管理员起诉德克萨斯州政府，称她因拒绝搬走图书而被解雇。
item.description:
"A public library is a foundation of any good society. It's like the cornerstone for our society and if that cornerstone were to fall, we would collapse."

Former librarian sues Texas county, alleges she was fired for refusing to remove books. https://t.co/NqYxINatnD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会（NTSB）主席周三在参议院听证会上表示，波音公司没有完全配合国家运输安全委员会对阿拉斯加航空公司门栓事件的调查。
item.description:
Boeing has not fully cooperated with the National Transportation Safety Board's investigation into the Alaska Airlines door plug incident, the chair of the NTSB said during a Senate hearing Wednesday. https://t.co/rsb3moNQD1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国广播公司新闻记者@TSoufiBurridge正在耶路撒冷报道以色列-哈马斯战争中可能达成的停火协议所面临挑战的最新情况。

item.title: 参议院共和党领袖米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的长期批评者，也是特朗普经常攻击的对象，他周三支持特朗普参加 2024 年总统竞选。

Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell, a longtime critic of Donald Trump and a frequent target, on Wednesday endorsed him in the 2024 presidential race. https://t.co/nKtdMqSm6A pic.twitter.com/5TmKzPs98s

item.description:
The widow of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, who died in prison three weeks ago, called on his supporters Wednesday to join a protest of this month's presidential election that Navalny devised shortly before his still-unexplained death. https://t.co/tbBUUyQOR2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 当局称，一名男子因涉嫌与弗吉尼亚州一名妇女在 1986 年的冷案谋杀案有关而被捕，DNA 证据还显示他与 80 年代的第二起谋杀案有关。
item.description:
A man has been arrested in connection with a Virginia woman's 1986 cold case murder, with DNA evidence also linking him to a second murder from the '80s, authorities say. https://t.co/DTweMSM7dp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: "竞选总统需要很大的勇气。"在尼基-黑莉中止 2024 年总统竞选活动后发表的声明中，拜登总统称赞黑莉在竞选期间愿意 "说出真相"，并欢迎黑莉的支持者。
item.description:
“It takes a lot of courage to run for President."

In a statement released after Nikki Haley suspended her 2024 presidential campaign, Pres. Biden commended Haley on her willingness to "speak the truth" during her run and welcomed Haley's supporters. https://t.co/xsCPd1sVW0 pic.twitter.com/xq8L8j9PMD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：尼基-黑莉（Nikki Haley）已暂停总统竞选活动，"我不后悔，"黑莉在南卡罗来纳州查尔斯顿的一个舞台上说。"虽然我不再是候选人，但我不会停止为我相信的事情发声"。
item.description:
BREAKING: Nikki Haley has suspended her presidential campaign,

"I have no regrets," Haley said from a stage in Charleston, South Carolina. "And although I will no longer be a candidate, I will not stop using my voice for the things I believe." https://t.co/Z2czpB7mtf pic.twitter.com/qWtuSEy2FA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：尼基-黑莉（Nikki Haley）已正式中止总统竞选活动，前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）成为共和党总统候选人。
item.description:
BREAKING: Nikki Haley has formally suspended her presidential campaign, making former Pres. Donald Trump the presumptive Republican nominee for president. https://t.co/zve5kBgEHC pic.twitter.com/49LCcNzGau

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024
